item.description:
Southern Caribbean Cruise



7 Nights on the Serenade of the Seas





Roundtrip from San Juan on Feb 20, 2010




Leave the snow behind you and set sail aboard the luxurious Royal Caribbean cruise ship Serenade of the Seas, visiting the scenic ports of the Southern Caribbean.

The most exotic Caribbean islands await you in the south: from white-sand beaches to panoramic mountain vistas and everything in between, a Southern Caribbean cruise vacation is filled with excitement and adventure.


Royal Caribbean's Serenade of the Seas offers the ultimate "at sea" experience by combining speed, added comfort, greater space, sweeping ocean vistas and an exceptional staff committed to serving your every whim. Among the ship's spectacular features are the ten-story glass-constructed Centrum, glass elevators facing the sea and the highest percentage of outside cabins in the Royal Caribbean fleet.



$75 Shipboard Credit per Stateroom


Deposit must be received by 8/1/09




Cruise Pricing:


Prices are per Person, double occupancy. Single rates available on request.


Cost per person (incl. Port Charges, taxes & fees)

Inside Category Q: $855.92
Ocean View Category I: $905.92
Balcony Category E3: $1105.92



  • $50 Deposit due with Reservation
  • 10/1/09 additional $450 per cabin due
  • 12/1/09 Final Payment due


Included: Shipboard accommodations, ocean transportation, most meals, some beverages and most onboard entertainment.

Not Included: Air transportation**; transfers**; items of a personal nature, such as shore & land excursions**, specialty restaurant fees, some beverages, photographs, gratuities/service fees, medical services, etc.
** You can add these during or after the reservation process.



Itinerary




Royal Caribbean International Serenade of the Seas

Sat 02/20 San Juan, Puerto Rico 08:30 PM
Sun 02/21 Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas 08:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Mon 02/22 St. Croix, USVI 08:00 AM - 05:30 PM
Tue 02/23 Basseterre, St. Kitts/Nevis 08:00 AM - 05:00 PM
Wed 02/24 Roseau, Dominica 08:00 AM - 05:00 PM
Thu 02/25 Bridgetown, Barbados 08:00 AM - 05:00 PM
Fri 02/26 At Sea
Sat 02/27 San Juan, Puerto Rico 07:00 AM



Kathy Neuberger (603) 526-2332


www.findallthecruises.com
Subscribe to our weekly newsletter








Signing up is as simple as 1 – 2 – 3!

1. RSVP YES and I will contact you to send me your email and a phone number where I can reach you (include best time)
2. I'll call and get all the details I need - Names, addresses, birthdates, etc
3. We process your deposit, and you will be all set!

Please call with any questions,

Kathy
Kathy & Howard Neuberger
CruiseOne
(603) 526-2332
Toll Free 1-888-813-3392
Fax 866-596-8197
